alert.note: Alert for Carbon; Monroe (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 13 at 3:08PM EST until December 16 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Carbon and Monroe. * WHEN...From Thursday morning through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall amounts will heavily depend on the timing of snow transitioning over to heavy mixed precipitation or rain Thursday night and Friday morning. Expect highest snowfall accumulations across higher elevations.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
